1: <pb/><t>Re' hin noq wilkiin panti' k'axik, re' QaJaaw Dios inuq'o'reej,</t> <t>eh re' reh kirutob'eej wo' hoq.</t>
2: <t>QaJaaw Dios, kinako'leej tii pan kiq'ab' taqe i</t> <t>chukul q'orik, taqe i ma' holohik ta kiq'orik chi wiij.</t>
3: <pb/><t>Raaj taq i hat aj chukul q'orik</t> <t>Â¿chib'ih taq i naa ak'axam ruuk' taqe re'?</t>
4: <t>Re' taq i naa ak'ulum chi riij re' chi naa taq kaat kikutum chi flecha q'as ju',</t> <t>naa taq kaat kik'atam ruuk' q'aaq'.</t>
5: <pb/><t>Re' hin q'e' ti' wilkiin chupaam i tinamit Mesec,</t> <t>noq patinik i nub'an chi kixilak i aj Cedar.</t>
6: <t>Eh najtir inutoq'aa' wihik chi kixilak i</t> <t>ma' ki ajwanik ta wach i wihik pansuqkiil k'uxliis.</t>
7: <t>Noq nuq'or chi naa qawihiik pansuqkiil k'uxliis,</t> <t>re' keh peleto chik kinkichaq' weej wii'.</t>
